Weapon.Name: Wooden Spear
Weapon.Description: Not good for much, It won't win you a war.

Weapon.Name: Stone Spear
Weapon.Description: A stick with a rock on it, very technical.

Weapon.Name: Iron Spear
Weapon.Description: Heavy but useful.

Weapon.Name: Steel Spear
Weapon.Description: The end has been sharpened to a point, a knife on a stick!

Weapon.Name: Elven Spear
Weapon.Description: Those Elves know how to make a pointy stick.

Weapon.Name: Dwarven Spear
Weapon.Description: The stumpy axe-like spear.

Weapon.Name: Orcish Spear
Weapon.Description: Fast and very heavy, used by Orcs as tooth picks.

Weapon.Name: Legendary Spear
Weapon.Description: Hand crafted by the best Blacksmith in the land, very deadly.

Weapon.Name: Dragon Bone Spear
Weapon.Description: Painstakingly carved using a rib of a dragon, this is a spear on steroids!

Weapon.Name: Wooden Sword
Weapon.Description: Looks more like a tree branch, blunt and useless.

Weapon.Name: Stone Sword
Weapon.Description: Introducing sharp stone... on a stick!

Weapon.Name: Iron Sword
Weapon.Description: Forged from the poorest iron in the land.

Weapon.Name: Steel Sword
Weapon.Description: A favourite amongst knights due to the low cost and sharp edge.

Weapon.Name: Elven Sword
Weapon.Description: Used in the Elf knight community, dont tell the humans!

Weapon.Name: Dwarven Sword
Weapon.Description: Surprisingly heavy considering the size.

Weapon.Name: Orcish Sword
Weapon.Description: Heavy and sharp.

Weapon.Name: Legendary Sword
Weapon.Description: Now your talking, lets take this baby for a spin.

Weapon.Name: Dragon Bone Sword
Weapon.Description: Who knew a corpse could be so deadly.

Weapon.Name: Wooden Axe
Weapon.Description: I wonder if it can chop wood? No, No it cannot.

Weapon.Name: Stone Axe
Weapon.Description: At least it can kill a tree, kind of.

Weapon.Name: Iron Axe
Weapon.Description: A lumberjacks best friend.

Weapon.Name: Steel Axe
Weapon.Description: Poor Dwarves can be seen with these.

Weapon.Name: Elven Axe
Weapon.Description: Lighter than a Steel Axe but just as sharp.

Weapon.Name: Dwarven Axe
Weapon.Description: Some say all baby Dwarves are given one of these on their first birthday.

Weapon.Name: Orcish Axe
Weapon.Description: Not used as much in the Orc community, its a mystery as to why they are made.

Weapon.Name: Legendary Axe
Weapon.Description: It is said that one swing can bring down a forest, but that is a lie.

Weapon.Name: Dragon Bone Axe
Weapon.Description: It is almost like the only use for dragon bones is to make weapons.

Weapon.Name: Wooden Mace
Weapon.Description: Now this really is a lump of wood.

Weapon.Name: Stone Mace
Weapon.Description: Boulder + rope + stick, easy!

Weapon.Name: Iron Mace
Weapon.Description: Heavy and spikey.

Weapon.Name: Steel Mace
Weapon.Description: As strong as, well, a block of steel.

Weapon.Name: Elven Mace
Weapon.Description: As strong as steel and as light as a feather.

Weapon.Name: Dwarven Mace
Weapon.Description: How do Dwarves carry these, its bigger than them!

Weapon.Name: Orcish Mace
Weapon.Description: Designed like an axe mace combo.

Weapon.Name: Legendary Mace
Weapon.Description: A solid wrecking ball.

Weapon.Name: Dragon Bone Mace
Weapon.Description: Very heavey and very dangerous.

Weapon.Name: Stone Great Sword
Weapon.Description: A Stone Great Sword. Heavy and annoying.

Weapon.Name: Iron Great Sword
Weapon.Description: Used by many a travelling mercenary.

Weapon.Name: Steel Great Sword
Weapon.Description: A great warriors weapon.

Weapon.Name: Elven Great Sword
Weapon.Description: Light, sharp and very, very large.

Weapon.Name: Dwarven Great Sword
Weapon.Description: The stumpy great sword, are you sure this isn't a knife?

Weapon.Name: Orcish Great Sword
Weapon.Description: An ornate design, which is surprising considering the brutal nature of the Orcs.

Weapon.Name: Legendary Great Sword
Weapon.Description: A weapon only wielded by the greatest heroes of the land.

Weapon.Name: Dragon Bone Great Sword
Weapon.Description: So heavy that two people are required to lift it, or, you know, you could just take it.

Weapon.Name: Stone Battle Axe
Weapon.Description: Vaguely looks like a battle axe, more of a hammer.

Weapon.Name: Iron Battle Axe
Weapon.Description: Forged for an angry lumberjack, dont even think about taking his maple syrup.

Weapon.Name: Steel Battle Axe
Weapon.Description: If the desire is to spin around in a circle and cause maximum damage, then this is the weapon for you!

Weapon.Name: Elven Battle Axe
Weapon.Description: Lighter and sharper than its Steel counterpart.

Weapon.Name: Dwarven Battle Axe
Weapon.Description: Dwarves love this weapon, it is heavily used in their royal guard.

Weapon.Name: Orcish Battle Axe
Weapon.Description: Loved by Orcs for its weight to kill ratio.

Weapon.Name: Legendary Battle Axe
Weapon.Description: Shines with unholy light, a truly scary weapon.

Weapon.Name: Dragon Bone Battle Axe
Weapon.Description: Almost all bones on a dragons corpse is used to make weapons, with varying degrees of success.

Weapon.Name: Wooden Bow
Weapon.Description: Strung using ripped up clothing, the body of this is a twig found lying around. Why not just throw the arrow?

Weapon.Name: Hunters Bow
Weapon.Description: Carved from wood and strung using high grade string.

Weapon.Name: Elven Bow
Weapon.Description: The ornate design is light and powerfull.

Weapon.Name: Orcish Bow
Weapon.Description: Spiked and deadly, usefull for bashing as well as firing arrows.

Weapon.Name: Legendary Bow
Weapon.Description: A true thing of beauty it is said that a limited amount exist due to the rarity of the materials.

Weapon.Name: Dragon Bone Bow
Weapon.Description: Yes even bows can be made with dragon bones.

Weapon.Name: Wooden Arrow(s)
Weapon.Description: Sharp stick with feathers on the end.

Weapon.Name: Stone Arrow(s)
Weapon.Description: A stone has been sharpened and tied to a wooden arrow.

Weapon.Name: Iron Arrow(s)
Weapon.Description: A forged arrow head sharpened to a point.

Weapon.Name: Steel Arrow(s)
Weapon.Description: Durable and powerfull, try not to break the arrow shaft.

Weapon.Name: Elven Arrow(s)
Weapon.Description: Created by the Elves, this is a strong arrow.

Weapon.Name: Orchish Arrow(s)
Weapon.Description: Barbed and mean, this arrows aren't messing about.

Weapon.Name: Legendary Arrow(s)
Weapon.Description: Only aloud to be used by the hunters that provide game for their king.

Weapon.Name: Dragon Bone Arrow(s)
Weapon.Description: Whittled from the bones of dragons flies straight and true.

Weapon.Name: Throwing Knife
Weapon.Description: Baby's first throwing weapon.

Weapon.Name: Throwing Axe
Weapon.Description: Are you sure you know what you're doing with that thing.

Weapon.Name: Shuriken
Weapon.Description: Like a ninja!

Weapon.Name: Javline
Weapon.Description: Long ridged stick, usefull for throwing.

Weapon.Name: Dragon Bone Chakram
Weapon.Description: A circle of sharpened bones.

Weapon.Name: Spark Staff
Weapon.Description: Fires small bolts of lighning, not very effective.

Weapon.Name: Fire Staff
Weapon.Description: Shoots a constant stream of fire, sounds cooler than it is.

Weapon.Name: Ice Staff
Weapon.Description: A freezing air is blasted in the direction the staff is facing.

Weapon.Name: Lightning Staff
Weapon.Description: A focused bolt of lightning quickly deals with your foes.

Weapon.Name: Flame Bolt Staff
Weapon.Description: A ball of fire is built up and shot at tremendous speed.

Weapon.Name: Ice Shard Staff
Weapon.Description: Many shards of ice fly towards your enemy.

Weapon.Name: Death Bolt Staff
Weapon.Description: Thor's hammer stored in an ornate stick.

Weapon.Name: Disintergration Staff
Weapon.Description: One puff from this staff will disintergrate even the coldest of enemys.

Weapon.Name: Ice Storm Staff
Weapon.Description: Casts a deadly storm of ice shards which surround the enemy.

Weapon.Name: Wooden Boomerang
Weapon.Description: It comes back!

Weapon.Name: Hollow Steel Boomerang
Weapon.Description: That looks like it would hurt.

Weapon.Name: Bladed Boomerang
Weapon.Description: How am I supposed to catch this?

Weapon.Name: Flaming Boomerang
Weapon.Description: Too hot to handle.

Weapon.Name: Enchanted Bullet Boomerang
Weapon.Description: The sonic boom will break through thick armour.
